website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive way to secure a dozen windows, but you're better off finding your own means to mount them.
pros: Good value for a dozen alarms (also available in an 8 pack)
cons: Tape used for installation can fail, setting off these alarms at random
Not as loud as other alarms

customer_reviews.title: Works Great IF You Have the Right Door Frames
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a sketchy neighborhood and needed a cheap security system fast. These do work as intended and boy they are LOUD. However, my doors have thick crown molding around them and the two pieces can't line up right next to each other. So, they can't work for me, unfortunately. I'm going to hang onto them and see if someone else I know can use them. Okay, I'm also hanging onto them because I'm too lazy to make returns, but they do work. Just keep in mind that both pieces need to be perpendicular to each other so take a look at your doors before buying!
customer_reviews.author: Amser

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. I saw a few folks said they had issues with them sticking, that they would falloff. I had no such issue. I cleaned the surfaces, waited for them to dry, then when I applied the components I pushed on them firmly for about 15 seconds. You can’t expect them to stick to a surface that is not clean, and you must make sure they have good contact. Just sticking them on there quickly might not do it. Other than that they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but.....
customer_reviews.text: As a device that will work well as a deterrent, there's only one problem. The sticky tape is not strong enough. I had to remove it and replace it with double-sided tape I bought at home depot. I had one fall off at night and sound off until it hit the floor, popping open and scattering the batteries out of their compartment. I put it back together and used better tape. Other than that, they work. Bad guys hate noise and lights.
customer_reviews.author: MAGAman

customer_reviews.title: Doberman window/door alarms are AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I completed my order on a Friday afternoon, and received the nicely packaged Doberman Security 8-pk window/door alarm kits in my mailbox the next Tuesday via. USPS. Fifteen minutes later, I completed the installation and testing of all 8 devices. Super easy! The "battery saver pull tabs" and peel-and-stick strips were big time savers. A few days later, I received a follow-up from Doberman Customer Support to see if I had any questions or issues. I recommend Doberman Security for their customer care and product value.
customer_reviews.author: BryanK

customer_reviews.title: Good alarm and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very easy to set up. Nice and loud. Great for wandering elders with dementia. One button on and off. Nice and basic no wholes to drill peel and stick.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold V

customer_reviews.title: Works- if you have a door and wall that align
customer_reviews.text: My doors have door frames so i cant align them to work. There should be other ways around this. So i was not able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sheeran

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: These are petite and awesome. I put it on every window and door in my apartment since I’m on the bottom level and I feel an extra sense of security. The noise is pretty alarming, and they can be pretty inconspicuous if applied right.
customer_reviews.author: KatWoman

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Can use on doors or windows. Only wish that you could read if they were turned on or off easier.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me Ray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Loud and easy to install. The adhesive provided sticks and has not fallen off. I even removed two and reapplied them with no problems. Great price for peace of mind. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Becca & kids

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very easy to install and use. Gives us a little peace of mind. 😊 A huge economical savings for security!
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Good product needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: The units did not adhere to the window units for more then a week - especially if you open and close the windows. The units themselves worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: reneeb

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy people. Shipping and delivery is fast. Quality is good and item does exactly as it says it will do. I'll be buying more that's a fact. Great job guys
customer_reviews.author: vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Gives an extra layer of security for not a lot of money. Not as loud as the GE alarms, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly right out of the box. Easy set up. Definitely recommend! And a great price.
customer_reviews.author: bbtrudell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what i wanted. Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for doors with raised trim.
customer_reviews.text: Not for doors with raised trim. The surface has to be flat.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: They work as describe. I need them super fast because my son start opening doors. They deliver a day earlier. Loud enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cktboricua69

customer_reviews.title: Work good an loud
customer_reviews.text: Work as describe. But Switch on/off is very obvious and not so hidden
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works as described... Perfect solution for a rental property where the tenant felt the need for added security...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie T.

customer_reviews.title: These alarms work very well tested them all before placing ...
customer_reviews.text: These alarms work very well tested them all before placing only one out of eight do not work which was a little disappointing but in the future may purchase more
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what was listed! Was able to secure 8 windows with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very loud. I put them on my doors and easy-to-access windows. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Lora M. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: except that the tape that it comes with doesn't work that good. They keep falling off
customer_reviews.text: Thry work, except that the tape that it comes with doesn't work that good. They keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works just great, but if you open door with it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just great , but if you open door with it on and it goes off all you had to do the shut it off is close the door!
customer_reviews.author: CLARENCE E KIMBER

product_meta.title: Doberman Security SE-0137-8PK Home Security Window/Door Alarm Kit, 8 Pack (White)
product_meta.description: With its simple peel and stick installation, ultra-thin design and loud alarm, the Doberman Security Window/Door Alarm kit is a low cost, effective solution to home security. Place the included magnet on the outside frame of any window or door you wish to protect. When opened by an intruder, the magnetic circuit is broken and a loud alarm will sound.
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC TRIGGER TECHNOLOGY - Loud 100 dB alarm alerts you of potential break-ins and when someone enters the door of a house/room or office
STURDY, COMPACT DESIGN - Detects entry and fits on any door or window - perfect for home, office, dorm room, garage or even RVs
EASY INSTALLATION - Simply peel and stick, no tools needed
INCLUDES 3 AG/LR44 Button Cell Batteries for each alarm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars44 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
